page.title: 20The Games We Play (cont)....
page.content: As soon as they have caught us we have to count. For a den you have a bench or a drain cover. My favorite game is Vegetable bob downs because you have 5 people and 1 of them has to be on. The rules are to walk about then stop, then the other people sit down very quickly and say a name of a vegetable. They have to be quick because the person thats on might get you. I play with my friends Antony, Kirstie, Marie and Samantha and another is the judge. I like the game very much because its fun.
